effect.name: Stencil Clip
effect.description: Use the color of the background pixels as the clipping area for the foreground pixels.

parameter.name: Stencil Color
parameter.description: The background color used to determine our stencil area. As long as a background pixel matches this color within some tolerance, the foreground pixel will be kept.

parameter.name: Tolerance
parameter.description: The tolerance for how close the BG pixels can be to the stencil color. This is in RGB distance.
